surname Zhi/Zhi (c. 2000 BC), fifth of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God

to tower/standing tall and upright (of large building)

sentences.english: Now, the stability of the RMB exchange rate still has a firm ground.
sentences.chinese: 現在，人民幣匯率的穩定，仍有堅實的基矗。

sentences.english: All the sentences were well written except the last one.
sentences.chinese: 所有的句子寫得都好，除了矗後一句話。
白金長矗悅來做珠寶飾物。

sentences.english: Himalayan Southwest Chu, Ussuri River north-east side.
sentences.chinese: 喜瑪拉雅西南矗，烏蘇里江東北邊。

sentences.english: Getting the message from the failure, it is the basement of the futural success.
sentences.chinese: 從失敗經驗中取得了教訓，即是將來勝利的基矗。

sentences.english: Not far from the brook stood a frowning rock.
sentences.chinese: 小河不遠處矗着一塊望夫石。

sentences.english: The models at the fashion looked very beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 在時裝表演中，模特那看上去非矗漂諒。

sentences.english: We should be clear about our industrial foundation and the agricultural foundation as well.
sentences.chinese: 摸清現實，不僅是工業基礎，還有個農業基矗。

sentences.english: Such superiority or inferiority is the objective basis of initiative or passivity.
sentences.chinese: 這種優勢或劣勢，是主動或被動的客觀基矗。

definition: name of a hill in Hunan
in 閌閬|闶阆, open space in a structure
to get ahead/to stride/to excel/Taiwan pr. [zhuo2]
see 徘徊[pai2 huai2], to dither/to hesitate/to pace back and forth/irresolute
